properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvu digivatchunu paramunundi vegame Vibhudu digivatchunu parama vadhuvukai{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}ప్రభువు దిగివచ్చును పరమునుండి వేగమే విభుడు తిరిగివచ్చును పరమ వధువుకై{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvu digivatchu naarbhaatamutho doota Shabhtamutho boora dwanitho kristu nandu Mrutulu modatane lethuru vaaritho nekamai Prabhuvu nedurkonduvaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaani vaani panulanu batti prabhuvu sidda Parachina jeetamu thaanitchunu thaane thwaragaa Vatchun edurkona siddhamaa siggutho bhayamutho Nunduvaa dinamunaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrudayamulo kalavarapadaka kristunandu Viswaasamunchudi shuddaluga meeru Siddhamannassu thoda praardhana cheyuchu Melconi yundidi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anekula paapamulanu bharimpa okka saare Kristu arpinchu konenu thana korakai Vechiyundu vaari koraku paaparahithudu Thirigi prathyakshamou{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
